articles.author: Lawrence Abrams
articles.title: Clop ransomware claims responsibility for MOVEit extortion attacks - BleepingComputer
articles.description: The Clop ransomware gang has told BleepingComputer they are behind the MOVEit Transfer data-theft attacks, where a zero-day vulnerability was exploited to breach multiple companies' servers and steal data.
articles.content: The Clop ransomware gang has told BleepingComputer they are behind the MOVEit Transfer data-theft attacks, where a zero-day vulnerability was exploited to breach multiple companies' servers and steal… [+3657 chars]

articles.title: Germany targets $2.1 bln in funding for Thyssenkrupp green steel plant - Reuters
articles.description: Germany is planning to make around 2 billion euros ($2.1 billion) available to help fund a green steel plant that Thyssenkrupp (TKAG.DE) aims to build at its base in Duisburg, one of the …

articles.author: Abid Habib
articles.title: Virgin Atlantic Adds 250,000 Seats Including Brazil, Bengaluru & Dubai - Simple Flying
articles.description: As the airline expands with the arrival of new aircraft and crew, it's expanding its reach across the globe.
articles.content: Virgin Atlantic is expanding its route network across three continents. The carrier is set to fly to São Paulo (GRU) in Brazil, its first appearance in South America. In Asia, the carrier will add it… [+5071 chars]
